name: electron-vue-parcel-boilerplate
description: A boilerplate for Electron + Vue + Parcel.

scripts.dev: parcel build --target electron --out-file main-electron.js ./src/main-electron-dev.ts && parcel NODE_ENV=development --port 8000 index.pug
scripts.build: parcel build --public-url . index.pug && parcel build --target electron ./src/main-electron.ts

author: Patrik Frantisek Balaz
